quest.name: The Room Where It Happened
journal: Alphinaud has devised a cunning strategy to reclaim Doma Castle.

In anticipation of Lord Hien's return, Alphinaud has developed a comprehensive strategy to retake Doma Castle. After Lyse and the Doman irregulars carry out a series of diversionary attacks, the Xaela will launch a surprise attack on the castle's airborne defenses. The twins and the shinobi will then disable the magitek field generators within the Dairyu Moon Gates, allowing the Confederate and Kojin naval forces to bombard the castle and secure the Doman Enclave. Finally, Lord Hien's main host will advance upon the castle and deal with the imperial forces within. Though Lord Hien seems satisfied with the plan, his hesitation does not go unnoticed...

Many tasks must be completed in advance of the attack, and Lord Hien would be glad of any assistance you can provide. As he has but recently returned, however, he knows not what these specific tasks are─but Alphinaud Leveilleur surely does.

Alphinaud lacks confidence in his ability to disable the field generators, and so he has turned to Cid nan Garlond, the foremost authority in the field of magitek. By way of Tataru in Kugane he has requested documentation on the devices in question. Given the importance of this information, he would be most grateful if you were to go to Kugane and collect it in person.

You are shocked to find Tataru a woman transformed, having taken after Hancock and dressed herself in the latest Hingan fashions. Flowing silks notwithstanding, she appears to have retained her classical charms─and hopefully the documentation you seek...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: So...have we got a plan? Tell me someone's got a plan.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Alphinaud has been hard at work devising our strategy to seize Doma Castle. I'm sure he will be happy to share the details with you all shortly.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: No time to soak it in. We have work to do.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Not that I doubted you for a moment, but I am relieved to see him returned.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: All is in place. We need but commit to action and see it through to the end.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I imagine you are eager to hear the particulars of our plan. Allow me a moment to gather everyone's attention...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Looks like I'll be heading to Namai. Wish me luck!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: As for how best to infiltrate the Moon Gates...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I suppose I ought to go and take stock of our supplies. We'll be needing a lot of weapons...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I am told Cirina fought with you in the Naadam? I would not have taken her for a warrior. Appearances can indeed be deceiving.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: This may be our final chance to win Doma her freedom. We dare not take any chances, for if we fail...

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: There is no shortage of tasks which must needs be completed before we can launch our attack. If you have a moment, perhaps you could lend a hand?

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: That said, I have only just returned. 'Twould be better for you to speak with Alphinaud to find out how you might be of service.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Much has changed in my absence. The state of the enclave, in particular, concerns me...

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: But it would seem Alphinaud understands the importance of ensuring their safety. You Scions are no ordinary mercenaries, that much is plain.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Trying to keep busy? Full glad am I to hear it. There is one task which comes to mind.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: As I explained during my briefing, Alisaie and I will need to infiltrate the Moon Gates to disable the magitek field generators.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Though I pride myself on my knowledge of various subjects, I must confess I lack confidence in my knowledge of this particular one. Which is why I turned to an expert.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I have been conversing with Cid via Tataru, attempting to ascertain the design of the generators based on our limited intelligence. Most recently he sent a parcel with some documents which he believes may be of use.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I would like for you to go to Kugane and bring them back here.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: In the meantime, I will continue to work with our shinobi allies to plot a path into the gates. Safe travels, Forename, and thank you again.

dialogue.name: HANCOCK
dialogue.text: Well, well, well! What a pleasant surprise this is!

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Forename!? What are you doing here? I thought you were off fighting nomads on the Azim Steppe!

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: ...Oh, you beat them! Good show! A shame I didn't get to see it.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Alphinaud has been keeping me apprised of the situation in Doma. I may not be any good in a physical fight, but in an, err...paperwork...fight, I'm the true khagan! Yeah!

obj.n: How Tataru Got Her Groove Back
